issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
There are multiple tests are failing on 2.1 branch.
Before releasing 2.1.1 it would be good to clean up this list

fields.summary: Fix the test failures for 2.1.1 caused by HIVE-13409

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Fix test failures for 2.1.1 regarding schema evolution with DECIMAL types

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Fix rest of q test file changes in branch-2.1

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body: Noop patch to check the current status

You can use this job to run tests on any branch.
https://builds.apache.org/view/H-L/view/Hive/job/HIVE-Branch-Test/

You need to trigger it manually, and specify a branch you want to test. It will not send results anywhere, just on the Jenkins output.

Merged patch of the following commits:
HIVE-13549: Remove jdk version specific out files from Hive2 (Mohit Sabharwal)
HIVE-13860: Fix more json related JDK8 test failures (Mohit Sabharwal)
HIVE-13894: Fix more json related JDK8 test failures Part 2 (Mohit Sabharwal)

Would like to see the test results

What is the username/password for the jenkins?
Resorting to patches until that time :)

Thanks,
Peter

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12831530/HIVE-14884-branch-2.1.patch

[~jcamachorodriguez] This patch was created by [~pvary], and includes HIVE-13549 to check how many tests fixed. It lowered the failures from 254 to 201
Also, [~aihuaxu] created and committed HIVE-14912 that lowered the failures to 122.

I think it is safe to commit HIVE-13549, but it removes JDK7 support for q-tests only. Is that ok for 2.1.1?
[~spena], my idea is to get that number to zero before releasing 2.1.1; hence, sure, sounds good.
All schema evolution tests are failing. [~mmccline] should have more idea on that.
Test report is unavailable.  What branch is it?

[~mmccline] This job has the tests failures. It was run manually on branch-2.1
https://builds.apache.org/view/H-L/view/Hive/job/HIVE-Branch-Test/10/
[~mmccline] Any updates on the test failures?

[~spena], I have just uploaded a patch to trigger again ptest against the branch, but I think we are still going to get many test failures; thus, I do not think it is wise to release 2.1.1 in this state. Did you or [~mmccline] had the chance to look into which issues causes the schema evolution failures and which patch we should backport to fix them?
